stimulusHtml: The artisans who made the Reliquary of Sainte-Foy fashioned the sculpture in gold and gemstones to elicit which of the following responses from pilgrims?
choicesHtml: Support for the metalworking guild that crafted the artwork
Reverence for the saint whose relics the sculpture contained
Envy of the wealth controlled by the local aristocracy
Worship of the physical container built to hold the saintly remains
